stack.description: Stack from UGA THiNC Lab for simulating Parrot ARDrone Quadrotors (versions 1 and 2) in Gazebo. Adapted from stack from TUM CVG for simulating quadrocopters. Includes models and launch files for ARDrone Quadrotors and grid environments. This code is specifically tailored to multi-robot simulation.
